description: Try our easy to follow Fried Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Fried Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs salt flakes (plus extra to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine half the salt with Cajun seasoning, paprika and pepper in a small bowl. Sprinkle spice mix on chicken pieces and place on a large plate. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours, or overnight if time permits.

Combine flour, cornflour and remaining salt in a large bowl. Whisk buttermilk and egg together in another large bowl. Coat chicken pieces with buttermilk mixture, cover with flour mixture and place on a tray.

Line a baking tray with paper towels. Place a wire rack over paper. Heat oil in a deep frying pan over medium heat. When hot, cook chicken in batches for 10 minutes or until golden, crisp and cooked through. Transfer to rack to drain. Sprinkle with extra sea salt and parsley. Serve with aioli and Kaleslaw.
